018package org.tquadrat.foundation.svg;
019
020import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.STABLE;
021
022import org.apiguardian.api.API;
023import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
024import org.tquadrat.foundation.svg.type.SVGNumber;
025import org.tquadrat.foundation.svg.type.SVGPreserveAspectRatio;
026
027/**
028 *  The definition of the SVG element {@code <symbol>}. <br>
029 *  <br>A {@code <symbol>} element is useless without the attribute {@code id}
030 *  set; therefore it is required already on creation and will not appear in
031 *  this interface.
032 *
033 *  @see SVGUtils#createSymbol(String)
034 *  @see SVGUtils#createSymbol(String,SVG)
035 *
036 *  @extauthor Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
037 *  @version $Id: SVGSymbol.java 820 2020-12-29 20:34:22Z tquadrat $
038 *  @since 0.0.5
039 *
040 *  @see "https://www.w3.org/TR/SVG/single-page.html#struct-SVGElement"
041 *
042 *  @UMLGraph.link
043 */
044@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: SVGSymbol.java 820 2020-12-29 20:34:22Z tquadrat $" )
045@API( status = STABLE, since = "0.0.5" )
046public sealed interface SVGSymbol extends SVGElementWithChildren, AllowsGraphicalEventAttributes, AllowsPresentationAttributes, AllowsStyleAttributes
047    permits SVGElementAdapter, org.tquadrat.foundation.svg.internal.SVGSymbolImpl
048{
049        /*-----------*\
050    ====** Constants **========================================================
051        \*-----------*/
052    /**
053     *  An empty array of {@code SVGSymbol} objects.
054     */
055    public static final SVGSymbol [] EMPTY_SVGSymbol_ARRAY = new SVGSymbol [0];
056
057        /*---------*\
058    ====** Methods **==========================================================
059        \*---------*/
060    /**
061     *  Sets the attribute that indicates whether external resources are
062     *  required to render this {@code <symbol>} element.
063     *
064     *  @param  flag    {@code true} if external resources are needed,
065     *      {@code false} if all required resources are local to the current
066     *      context.
067     */
068    public void setExternalResourcesRequired( final boolean flag );
069
070    /**
071     *  Sets the mode for the aspect ration preservation for this
072     *  {@code <symbol>} element.
073     *
074     *  @param  value   The type; if {@code null} the
075     *      attribute will be removed.
076     */
077    public void setPreserveAspectRatio( final SVGPreserveAspectRatio value );
078
079    /**
080     *  Defines the visible area for this {@code <symbol>} element.
081     *
082     *  @param  x   The x coordinate of top left corner of the area.
083     *  @param  y   The y coordinate of top left corner of the area.
084     *  @param  width   The width of the area.
085     *  @param  height  The height of the area.
086     */
087    public void setViewBox( final SVGNumber x, final SVGNumber y, final SVGNumber width, final SVGNumber height );
088}
089//  interface SVGSymbol
090
091/*
092 *  End of File
093 */
